item.title: Use Bootstrap Table in Webpack
item.description: Because I saw the problem saying using the latest version of Bootstrap Table in Webpack will fail, I tried how to use Bootstrap Table in Webpack from scratch. First, according to the Getting Started documentation of Webpack, we created a test project webpack-bootstrap-table, here we use http-server to start the service: 1 2 3 4 mkdir webpack-bootstrap-table cd webpack-bootstrap-table yarn init -y yarn add webpack webpack-cli http-server -D Next, add bootstrap-table and the required dependencies jquery and bootstrap:
